main event: A UFO was observed near Randolph AFB, Texas on July 8, 1958, with a duration of observation lasting 35 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as a white elongated shape resembling a pin with a bright star-like tail., The observation was made in the NE descending direction., The object emitted no sound during the observation., The conclusions included possibilities of the object being a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical., Insufficient data was available for a definitive identification of the object.
witness description: Tower operator and additional personnel at Randolph AFB
